myMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
myMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

myMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
myMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
myMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

myMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
myMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

myMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
myMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !myMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

myMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
myMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !myMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
